text: Pål Eugen Bucher Skjønberg (20 October 1919 - 3 February 2014) was a Norwegian actor. He was born in Stavanger. He was the son of actors Eugen and Henny Skjønberg. He started acting in 1946. He retired in 1991. Skjønberg died on 3 February 2014, aged 94. He was outlived by his two children with actress, Elisabeth Bang. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian stage actors Category:Norwegian television actors Category:People from Stavanger
title: Pål Skjønberg
